column1: Court from considering any point upon which the actual decision of the Board
might be upheld. His Lordship stated at p 109:
“Mr. Nadarajah, for the assessee, raises a fresh point on the meaning of
section 65………….Incidently, there was no reference to us on this point by
the Board of Review, since that point was not out to the Board when they
were called upon to adjudicate in appeal, but we are not, of course,
